last_episode_to_air.name: All Good Things...
last_episode_to_air.overview: In the final episode of The Hills, there will be goodbyes, tears, promises, love and heartbreak. Kristin will have to decide if she's going to make a major change in her life, which may force Brody to make a decision about their relationship. Audrina chooses a new, independent life without Justin, but will that be the right choice? Lo weighs whether or not to take the next step with her boyfriend, and Stephanie, for the first time, believes that she's found true happiness.

name: The Hills
overview: After high school graduation, "Laguna Beach" alumna Lauren sets out to live on her own in Los Angeles and work as an intern at Teen Vogue.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview:
The first season of The Hills, an American reality television series, consists of 10 episodes and was broadcast on MTV. It aired from May 31, 2006, until August 2, 2006. The season was filmed primarily in Los Angeles, California, with additional footage in New York City. The executive producer was Liz Gateley.

The Hills focuses on the lives of Lauren Conrad, Audrina Patridge, Whitney Port, and Heidi Montag. During the season, Conrad moves from Laguna Beach to Los Angeles. Accompanied by her best friend and housemate Montag, the pair attend the Fashion Institute of Design and Merchandising, though the latter left the college after receiving employment from Bolthouse Productions. Conrad befriends Port through an internship with Teen Vogue, while Montag develops a companionship with Patridge after learning that she lives in their apartment building.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: The second season of The Hills premiered on January 15, 2007 and concluded on April 2, 2007. The season continues to follow the lives of Lauren Conrad, Heidi Montag, Audrina Patridge and Whitney Port in Los Angeles as they face new challenges at work and school, with romances threatening to damage their friendships. This season was filmed from late summer 2006 through February 2007.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview:
The third season of The Hills, an American reality television series, consists of 28 episodes and was broadcast on MTV. The first portion aired from August 13, 2007, until December 10, 2007, while the second portion aired from March 24, 2008, until May 12, 2008. It was primarily filmed in Los Angeles, California, with additional footage in Crested Butte, Colorado; Las Vegas, Nevada; and Paris, France. The executive producer was Liz Gateley.

The Hills focuses on the lives of Lauren Conrad, Audrina Patridge, Whitney Port, and Heidi Montag. During the season, Conrad ended her friendship with Montag after suspecting that she and her boyfriend Spencer Pratt fabricated rumors of a sex tape involving herself and ex-boyfriend Jason Wahler. The ensuing feud between the three became a central focus of the series, and was carried through each subsequent season. Meanwhile, Patridge resumed a relationship with her on-again/off-again boyfriend Justin Brescia.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview:
The fourth season of The Hills, an American reality television series, consists of 20 episodes and was broadcast on MTV. It aired from August 18, 2008, until December 22, 2008. The season was filmed primarily in Los Angeles, California, with additional footage in New York City, New York; Las Vegas, Nevada; Italy; and Cabo San Lucas, Mexico. The executive producer was Liz Gateley.

The Hills focuses on the lives of Lauren Conrad, Audrina Patridge, Whitney Port, and Heidi Montag. During the season, Conrad's distaste for Montag's boyfriend Spencer Pratt continues to inhibit reconciliation between the women. Meanwhile, Patridge is concerned that her new housemate Lo Bosworth is straining her relationship with Conrad. The season finale saw Port relocate to New York City to accept employment with Diane von FÃ¼rstenberg, while Montag and Pratt elope.

Upon the conclusion of the season, Port was commissioned her own spin-off series The City, which originally chronicled the lives of her and friends Olivia Palermo, Jay Lyon, Erin Lucas, and Adam Senn. Additionally, rumors were widespread that Conrad wished to leave the series to pursue other career opportunities, though she made her final appearance on the series during the mid-season finale of the following season.

episodes.name: New City, New Drama
episodes.overview: Lauren ("LC") moves from Laguna Beach to Los Angeles where she plans to apply for an internship at Teen Vogue and attend fashion school. Alongside her is best friend Heidi who is pretty much just into the party scene. The real test of Lauren's new life is if she can juggle work, school, and partying. However, no matter where she goes, drama always seems to follow.

episodes.name: A Change of Plans
episodes.overview: Lauren has to face her boss after the party. Meanwhile, Heidi doesn't take school seriously and makes different plans for her future.

episodes.name: An Unexpected Call
episodes.overview: Lauren gets an assignment to fly to New York and deliver a dress for a fashion show. Heidi is faced with the reality of her "dream job" because she is expected to do work.

episodes.name: Lauren and Jason, Take Two
episodes.overview: Lauren receives flowers and another phone call from Jason. Heidi almost calls it quits from her job at Bolthouse Productions after being told that she cannot travel to Las Vegas with her co-workers as she is not yet 21.

episodes.name: Jason's Birthday
episodes.overview: After a Teen Vogue event, Lauren hurries home as it's Jason's birthday. However, things don't go well as Jason only wants to hang out with his friends.

episodes.name: Boyfriends and Work Don't Mix
episodes.overview: Heidi gets her big chance to work in the nightclub scene, but it happens to fall on her anniversary.  While at a Teen Vogue fashion show, Whitney is asked to walk the runway since a model is a no show. Meanwhile, Jason does his best to get Lauren to pay more attention to him, and less to work and school.

episodes.name: Somebody Always Has to Cry
episodes.overview: As the holiday season comes around, Lauren, Heidi, Jason and Jordan are ready to celebrate. However, things don't go so well. While at a New Year's Eve party Lauren and Jason have a big fight, causing Lauren to storm off with Heidi.

episodes.name: You Can't Just Be with Me?
episodes.overview: Whitney and Lauren are given the task of photographing male models for Teen Vogue, causing Jason to feel jealous. Meanwhile, Heidi and Jordan get into yet another argument.

episodes.name: Love Is Not a Maybe Thing
episodes.overview: Heidi and Jordan's relationship starts to go downhill as Heidi starts to realize that she may not feel true love for Jordan.

episodes.name: Timing Is Everything
episodes.overview: Lauren and Jason make plans to spend the summer together, but their plans take a turn when Lauren is offered a summer job in Paris, France.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview:
The first season of The Hills, an American reality television series, consists of 10 episodes and was broadcast on MTV. It aired from May 31, 2006, until August 2, 2006. The season was filmed primarily in Los Angeles, California, with additional footage in New York City. The executive producer was Liz Gateley.

The Hills focuses on the lives of Lauren Conrad, Audrina Patridge, Whitney Port, and Heidi Montag. During the season, Conrad moves from Laguna Beach to Los Angeles. Accompanied by her best friend and housemate Montag, the pair attend the Fashion Institute of Design and Merchandising, though the latter left the college after receiving employment from Bolthouse Productions. Conrad befriends Port through an internship with Teen Vogue, while Montag develops a companionship with Patridge after learning that she lives in their apartment building.

episodes.name: Out with the Old...
episodes.overview: Lauren faces the aftermath of her decision to opt out of her summer internship, Whitney returns from her internship, and Audrina and Heidi find themselves in a major feud over a new guy.

episodes.name: When You Least Expect It
episodes.overview: Heidi finds out the results of her pregnancy test while Lauren and Whitney are asked to cover a major fashion show. Meanwhile, Audrina turns Spencer down when he asks her out on a date.

episodes.name: The Best Night Ever
episodes.overview: Heidi throws a party for her birthday where Audrina shows up to try and make amends. However, Heidi refuses to listen.

episodes.name: Who Do You Trust?
episodes.overview: Heidi and Audrina go out to have dinner and they finally talk about their issues and Spencer.

episodes.name: One Big Interruption
episodes.overview: Spencer refuses to let go of Heidi. Meanwhile Lauren and Whitney are on the spot, because  "super-intern" arrives at Teen Vogue.

episodes.name: You Have Chosen
episodes.overview: Lauren is not at all thrilled in Heidi's decision to get back together with Spencer. The situation between best friends becomes even more heated and leaves their relationship hanging.

episodes.name: With Friends Like These...
episodes.overview: As if Lauren's falling off with Heidi wasn't enough, another one of her eldest friends, Jen, has eyes for Brody. Jen feels guilty for hooking up with Brody but Heidi encourages her to go for what she wants. Clearly, there is a lot more to mend in their relationships and Lauren assures Heidi that they'll never be the same as long as Spencer's still in her life.

episodes.name: Enough Is Enough
episodes.overview: Lauren tries to make peace with Heidi, but is instead stood up when Heidi decides to meet up with Spencer instead. Meanwhile, Whitney finds herself annoyed at the fact that she is not respected as a Teen Vogue intern.

episodes.name: New Year, New Friends
episodes.overview: Lauren and Audrina make plans for New Year's Eve with a pizza and champagne pre-party. Spencer asks Heidi to move in with him and Lo moves into L.A.

episodes.name: Apology Not Accepted
episodes.overview: Heidi decides to throw Lauren a surprise 21st birthday party and tells her about Spencer asking her to move in with him. Jen tries to apologize to Lauren but instead makes excuses, thus, Lauren doesn't accept her apology.

episodes.name: Everybody Falls
episodes.overview: Whitney is getting ready to work with Teen Vogue after graduation, however, she has a lot of competition with other interns. She also gets to model at "Good Morning America." Meanwhile, Spencer still insists that Heidi move in with him.

episodes.name: Goodbye For Now
episodes.overview: Whitney flies to New York City to apply for a new job at Teen Vogue. Meanwhile, in Los Angeles, Heidi gets a call from Spencer who has a huge surprise for her.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: The second season of The Hills premiered on January 15, 2007 and concluded on April 2, 2007. The season continues to follow the lives of Lauren Conrad, Heidi Montag, Audrina Patridge and Whitney Port in Los Angeles as they face new challenges at work and school, with romances threatening to damage their friendships. This season was filmed from late summer 2006 through February 2007.

episodes.name: You Know What You Did
episodes.overview: The third season premieres with Lauren and Heidi still unable to get past their differences and having become mortal enemies. Meanwhile, Whitney has graduated from college and is now juggling a real job and Audrina has become Lauren's new roommate and best friend.

episodes.name: Big Girls Don't Cry
episodes.overview: Lauren returns to Laguna Beach for some advice. Meanwhile, Audrina and her new beau get serious with their relationship and Spencer proposes to Heidi.

episodes.name: Truth and Time Tells All
episodes.overview: Audrina invites Lauren out to dinner to get to know Justin better. Lauren is not impressed by him. Audrina talks to Justin and decides to give their relationship time. Spencer suprises Heidi by buying two arcade games for the apartment. Later, she suprises him by painting over the mural in the living room.

episodes.name: Meet the Parents
episodes.overview: Spencer and Heidi go away for the weekend to meet Heidi's parents, causing Spencer to flake on his and Brody's barbeque. Lauren, Audrina, Lo, and Justin Bobby attend. Justin Bobby flirts with other girls and leaves Audrina at the party, and Lauren finally realizes that she and Heidi will never be friends again.

episodes.name: Rolling with the Enemy
episodes.overview: Just when everyone believes that Justin Bobby is finally history, Audrina decides to rekindle the relationship, much to Lauren and Lo's surprise.

episodes.name: Second Chances
episodes.overview: Lauren is still wondering who could be the guy for her when suddenly Jason gives her a call and wants to catch up.

episodes.name: They Meet Again
episodes.overview: Heidi tries to fit into her new job. Meanwhile Lauren has to decide if she will give Jason another chance.

episodes.name: For Better Or Worse
episodes.overview: Spencer and Heidi's wedding date gets closer, but will he tell his family before he steps into church? The Teen Vogue event gives Whitney and Lauren a lot of work, while Jason tires to start over with a new girl and a new place.

episodes.name: What Happens In Vegas...
episodes.overview: Brody celebrates his birthday in Las Vegas and of course Lauren and her friends are invited too. Meanwhile Heidi has to face more problems at work than she likes.

episodes.name: What Goes Around...
episodes.overview: When Jen wants to be friends again with Lauren, however the dark past starts to haunt everyone. And not everyone likes the past revealed.

episodes.name: No More Mr Nice Guy
episodes.overview: Lauren goes out with one of the male models from a photo shoot, leaving Brody to question everything that has developed in the past weeks.

episodes.name: Stress And The City
episodes.overview: Whitney and Lauren are sent to New York to present their ideas about the big fashion show. Meanwhile Franky tries to fix Brody's and Spencer's friendship.

episodes.name: Young Hollywood
episodes.overview: The Young Hollywood party finally happens and Whitney is in charge. Heidi celebrates her 21th birthday with Spencer. And Audrina might have a new admirer.

episodes.name: Forgive and Forget
episodes.overview: Lauren and Whitney have to cover an event for Teen Vogue, where Lauren runs into Heidi and of course they fight again. Later on Heidi tries to make up to Lauren, but Lauren turns her down. Meanwhile Audrina and Justin still struggle in their undefined relationship.

episodes.name: With This Ring...
episodes.overview: Heidi and Spencer constantly fight about how they should get married. Will they find a solution? Meanwhile Whitney has found a guy that asks her out on a date.

episodes.name: A Night At The Opera
episodes.overview: Lauren and Audrina find out that Spencer has a sister. She also pays Spencer and Heidi a visit. When Lauren and Audrina hang out with Brody, they not only run into Spencer's sister, but also run into Justin - with another girl.

episodes.name: Once A Player...
episodes.overview: Stephanie tells Spencer that Heidi might bail out of the wedding, so Spencer and Heidi fight once again. Lauren and Audrina both have a date.

episodes.name: When One Door Closes...
episodes.overview: Broken hearts as far as the eyes reaches: Heidi and Spencer can't agree on their wedding plans while Brody and Lauren both refuse to make the first step.

episodes.name: Paris Changes Everything
episodes.overview: Lauren and Whitney go to Paris, but the trip is marred for Lauren when she finds out Brody is seeing someone new. Meanwhile, Spencer follows Heidi to Colorado to try to win her back.

episodes.name: Back To LA
episodes.overview: After their week in Paris, Lauren and Whitney are back home and have to adjust to the changes and the changes they plan to do.

episodes.name: An Unlikely Friend
episodes.overview: Loyalty lines are questioned when Stephanie Pratt makes nice with Lauren at FIDM. Plus, Whitney travels to NYC to jump-start her career with People's Republic.

episodes.name: When Spencer Finds Out...
episodes.overview: It's Lauren's birthday and for some guests an appearance at her party could mean a lot of trouble. Also from whom will Lauren receive a birthday kiss?

episodes.name: Just Be Careful...
episodes.overview: After the much talked about birthday party Lauren had, the talk of the characters on The Hills is Lauren's friendship with Stephanie. Audrina is approached by someone unexpected, much to someone else's discomfort.

episodes.name: Girls Night Out
episodes.overview: Lauren is surprised by a job offer she receives. Meanwhile Heidi enjoys a night out with her friends, until she spots Spencer and things end up in a fight.

episodes.name: A New Roommate
episodes.overview: Lauren and Lo are looking into the real estate market as they plan to buy a house. Meanwhile, Audrina reconsiders her situation as a single woman.

episodes.name: A Date With The Past
episodes.overview: The girls go out to find a new home. When they find one, the guest list for the housewarming party is subject to more than just one fight.

episodes.name: No Place Like Home
episodes.overview: While Lo and Lauren enjoy living at the house, Audrina feels more and more left out. Meanwhile Stephanie thinks it's time to get rid of Spencer and Heidi prepares her next step in her career.

episodes.name: The Next Move Is Yours
episodes.overview: Lauren tries to uphold her friendship to Audrina, but is it already too late? Meanwhile Spencer tries to win Heidi back and risks her career to do so.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview:
The third season of The Hills, an American reality television series, consists of 28 episodes and was broadcast on MTV. The first portion aired from August 13, 2007, until December 10, 2007, while the second portion aired from March 24, 2008, until May 12, 2008. It was primarily filmed in Los Angeles, California, with additional footage in Crested Butte, Colorado; Las Vegas, Nevada; and Paris, France. The executive producer was Liz Gateley.

The Hills focuses on the lives of Lauren Conrad, Audrina Patridge, Whitney Port, and Heidi Montag. During the season, Conrad ended her friendship with Montag after suspecting that she and her boyfriend Spencer Pratt fabricated rumors of a sex tape involving herself and ex-boyfriend Jason Wahler. The ensuing feud between the three became a central focus of the series, and was carried through each subsequent season. Meanwhile, Patridge resumed a relationship with her on-again/off-again boyfriend Justin Brescia.

episodes.name: We'll Never Be Friends
episodes.overview: The tension between Lo, Lauren and Audrina continues and soon things reach boiling point.

episodes.name: Drama Follows Them
episodes.overview: Stephanie's birthday party is around the corner and so everyone tries to make an appearance. Also things start to change for Whitney.

episodes.name: Better Off As Friends
episodes.overview: Whitney's love life starts to heat up while Lauren's starts to cool down. Meanwhile Heidi and Spencer fight.

episodes.name: Boys Make Girls Cry
episodes.overview: Brody attacks Stephanie and insults her, just before he's arrested.

episodes.name: Something Has To Change
episodes.overview: Brody is still in jail, so the girls try to come up with a way to get him out. Plus Audrina and Lauren finally sit down and talk to each other.

episodes.name: You Always Miss A Best Friend
episodes.overview: Justin goes MIA. Holly calls Lauren, but how will Heidi and Spencer react to that?

episodes.name: When Lauren's Away...
episodes.overview: When Lauren is away for a couple of days, Stephanie and Doug start dating secretly. How long will that stay a secret though?

episodes.name: Don't Act Innocent
episodes.overview: Doug and Stephanie have to explain themselves to Lauren. Meanwhile Heidi's mother pays a visit.

episodes.name: If She Never Met Spencer...
episodes.overview: Heidi tries to reach out to Lauren. Meanwhile Audrina has a date, but what will Justin say to that?

episodes.name: Who to Choose?
episodes.overview: Spencer sets an ultimatum for Holly to move out. Meanwhile Audrina checks which boy is best for her. Will it be Justin?

episodes.name: You'll Never Have This...
episodes.overview: Lauren and Audrina travel to Cabo for Brody's birthday, but Audrina's problems with Justin threaten to ruin the festivities. Back in LA, Spencer gives Stephanie's new boyfriend a hard time over dinner.

episodes.name: I Want You To Be With Me
episodes.overview: Audrina wants to make things work with Corey, but finds herself torn when Justin drops by Epic. Meanwhile, Stephanie starts having doubts about her new boyfriend when he fails to defend her in front of Brody.

episodes.name: Its Her Move
episodes.overview: Audrina suprises Lauren when she moves out, and Heidi disappoints Brent Bolthouse when she invites Spencer to a work event and gets caught having a little too much fun.

episodes.name: Back To New York
episodes.overview: Whitney finds romance when she and Lauren head to New York City for fashion week. Back in L.A., Spencer makes things worse for Heidi by approaching Brent to ask for her job back.

episodes.name: One Last Chance
episodes.overview: Heidi decides to go back to Brent and Sam and ask for her job back. Plus, Holly Montag's crashing at Lauren and Lo's since getting kicked out of her sister's place.

episodes.name: You Did This
episodes.overview: A nasty rumor threatens to end Lauren and Audrina's friendship and Heidi realizes Spencer's been withholding information from her.

episodes.name: Its About Trust
episodes.overview: Audrina tries to make amends with Lauren after the fall-out. Then it's off to Nana's house where Spencer and Stephanie compete for their grandmother's affection.

episodes.name: Dream Boy, Dream Job
episodes.overview: In NYC, Whitney has an interview with Diane von Furstenberg and sees Jay. Plus, Lauren says goodbye to her Laguna home and Stephanie makes a difficult decision about Cameron.

episodes.name: Mr & Mrs Pratt
episodes.overview: Spencer and Heidi ignore the concerns of their families and elope in Mexico. Meanwhile, Whitney says goodbye to Lauren and her life in Los Angeles as she leaves for her dream job in New York City.

episodes.name: I Heidi Take Thee Spencer
episodes.overview: The season four finale finds Lauren and Heidi running into each other and are reminded why the once were best friends. Meanwhile, as Heidi's mom pays a visit, the she and Spencer know they must face reality; and Audrina is surprised by Justin with a trip to Palm Springs.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview:
The fourth season of The Hills, an American reality television series, consists of 20 episodes and was broadcast on MTV. It aired from August 18, 2008, until December 22, 2008. The season was filmed primarily in Los Angeles, California, with additional footage in New York City, New York; Las Vegas, Nevada; Italy; and Cabo San Lucas, Mexico. The executive producer was Liz Gateley.

The Hills focuses on the lives of Lauren Conrad, Audrina Patridge, Whitney Port, and Heidi Montag. During the season, Conrad's distaste for Montag's boyfriend Spencer Pratt continues to inhibit reconciliation between the women. Meanwhile, Patridge is concerned that her new housemate Lo Bosworth is straining her relationship with Conrad. The season finale saw Port relocate to New York City to accept employment with Diane von FÃ¼rstenberg, while Montag and Pratt elope.

Upon the conclusion of the season, Port was commissioned her own spin-off series The City, which originally chronicled the lives of her and friends Olivia Palermo, Jay Lyon, Erin Lucas, and Adam Senn. Additionally, rumors were widespread that Conrad wished to leave the series to pursue other career opportunities, though she made her final appearance on the series during the mid-season finale of the following season.

episodes.name: Don't Cry on Your Birthday
episodes.overview: Lauren lands in tears during her surprise birthday party when Heidi rocks the boat by showing up uninvited. Plus, Spencer takes a swing at Stephanie's ex-boyfriend, Cameron.

episodes.name: Everything Happens for a Reason
episodes.overview: Heidi and Spencer evaluate their relationship after the bar scene and Lauren scolds Stephanie for pushing Heidi on her.

episodes.name: I'm Done With You
episodes.overview: After Heidi catches Spencer at a nightclub with Stacie the bartender, she demands they go to couple's therapy. Plus, Lauren puts her reputation on the line when she gets Stephanie an interview at People's Revolution.

episodes.name: Crazy In Love
episodes.overview: As Audrina tries to get over Justin, she sees Brody in a new light. Plus, Heidi drags Spencer to couples' therapy and Stephanie has a hard time handling work at People's Revolution.

episodes.name: I Always Had A Little Crush
episodes.overview: Things heat up between Audrina and Brody in Hawaii and Heidi's ex-boyfriend, Colby comes for a visit.

episodes.name: Playmates Bring The Drama
episodes.overview: The gang make their return to Los Angeles. Meanwhile, Brody and Audrina deal the repercussions from their hookup in Hawaii.

episodes.name: Keep Your Enemies Closer
episodes.overview: Lauren is put into an awkward situation after Stephanie messes up at work. Meanwhile, Justin calls out Audrina for hooking up with Brody.

episodes.name: Father Of The Bride
episodes.overview: Spencer has an important question to ask Heidi's father when he comes for a visit. Meanwhile, Lauren make the decision to fire Stephanie from People's Revolution.

episodes.name: Hi Lauren, It's Spencer...
episodes.overview: Spenser is asked by Heidi to make amends with Lauren in hopes that she'll attend their wedding. Elsewhere, a recently fired Stephanie has a run-in with Kelly Cutrone, her former boss.

episodes.name: Something Old, Something New
episodes.overview: Heidi and Spencer head down the aisle and two unexpected guests manage to attend the ceremony.

episodes.name: It's On Bitch!
episodes.overview: Kristin makes a big first impression in The Hills when she gets in a fight with two different women over one guy, works her way to queen bee status and lands a hot date with a motorcycle all in one episode.

episodes.name: Mess With Me, I Mess With You
episodes.overview: Kristin kicks her pursuit of Justin into high gear after Audrina blows her off, while Heidi and Spencer's opposing views on kids causes trouble.

episodes.name: Strike One
episodes.overview: Justin doesn't show up at Brody's party and Audrina has a new target.

episodes.name: Old Habits Die Hard
episodes.overview: Justin tries to make up with Kristin. Heidi thinks something is wrong with Holly.

episodes.name: Sorry Boo, Strike Two
episodes.overview: Heidi and Stephanie sit Holly down for an intervention when she continues drinking. Plus, Kristin gets upset with Justin's head games and Brody and Jayde get into a fight that leads them to reconsider their relationship.

episodes.name: I'm Done With You
episodes.overview: Justin finds himself in hot water after Kristin and Audrina meet. Heidi wants to have a baby, but Spencer has another plan.

episodes.name: On To The Next
episodes.overview: Audrina gets her heart broken when Justin ends things for good, it's a war of the exes over Brody, and Spencer considers drastic measures to stop Heidi's baby obsession.

episodes.name: Can't Always Get What You Want
episodes.overview: While on a lunch date, Kristin and Brody recall the crazy times they used to have together. After Brody toasts to having a nice lunch without fighting, Kristin mentions that Jayde wants to talk with her. Brody tells Kristin she's out of her mind ...

episodes.name: Mr. Right Now
episodes.overview: Kristin and Stacie's girls' weekend in Vegas becomes a threesome when Justin joins the fun. Plus, Spencer panics when he uncovers Heidi's pregnancy scheme.

episodes.name: The Boys Of Summer
episodes.overview: Kristin is in Malibu packing up her beach house when she tells Stacie she doesn't want to pursue a relationship with Justin Bobby. Kristin says things were perfect when they were in Vegas, but she knows real life isn't like vacation.

episodes.name: Put On a Happy Face
episodes.overview: Heidi heads home to show her family her post-surgery look, and Kristin's all-night partying begins to worry Audrina, Lo and Stephanie.

episodes.name: Rumor Has It
episodes.overview: Stephanie gets blamed for spreading the rumors about Kristin's drug abuse problems, and Spencer lashes out when his sister approaches him at a party....

episodes.name: The Elephant in the Room
episodes.overview: Kristin urges Audrina to commit to Ryan, then moves in to get closer to Brody and Spencer causes as scene when he gets angry with Holly at Enzo's party....

episodes.name: This is Goodbye
episodes.overview: Heidi and Spencer's behavior cause their friends and family to make a difficult choice, while Kristin and Brody hook up but agree to stay single.

episodes.name: A New Bird
episodes.overview: Brody puts his friendship with Kristin on the line when he starts seeing another girl. Lo sets Stephanie up on a double date....

episodes.name: Ghost From The Past
episodes.overview: Kristin has a hard time moving on from Brody. Audrina bumps in to Justin and starts to have doubts about her relationship with Ryan.

episodes.name: The Company You Keep
episodes.overview: When Justin Bobby shows up onstage at a show Audrina, Steph and Lo are at, all the girls are surprised.

episodes.name: Between A Rocker And A Hard Place
episodes.overview: Audrina's relationship with Ryan is put to the test when he meets Justin for the first time. Brody sides with Kristin when Allie picks a fight with her.

episodes.name: Break-Up To Make-Up
episodes.overview: It's Audrina's birthday and the gang, including Justin, board a boat at Marina Del Ray to celebrate. Elsewhere, Kristin has another run in with Allie at a club where a fight erupts. Also Audrina breaks up with Ryan and Kristin warns McKaela to stay away from her.

episodes.name: Welcome To The Jungle
episodes.overview: The gang heads to Costa Rica for a group surf trip, and Brody gets jealous when Kristin hooks up with a local bartender. Meanwhile, Audrina fights her attraction to Justin, and Stephanie finds herself at odds with the jungle environment

episodes.name: Loves Me Not
episodes.overview: Brody and Kristin have a heart-to-heart, she wants to give their relationship another shot and Stephanie starts seeing someone new.

episodes.name: All Good Things...
episodes.overview: In the final episode of The Hills, there will be goodbyes, tears, promises, love and heartbreak. Kristin will have to decide if she's going to make a major change in her life, which may force Brody to make a decision about their relationship. Audrina chooses a new, independent life without Justin, but will that be the right choice? Lo weighs whether or not to take the next step with her boyfriend, and Stephanie, for the first time, believes that she's found true happiness.
